original_text: But exhort one another every day, as long as it is called “today,” that none of you may be hardened by the deceitfulness of sin.
korean_text: 오직 오늘이라 일컫는 동안에 매일 피차 권면하여 너희 중에 누구든지 죄의 유혹으로 완고하게 되지 않도록 하라

sentences.original_text: But exhort one another every day
as long as it is called “today,”
that none of you may be hardened
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중에 누구도 완악하게 되지 않도록
